meta.title: Carlos Andrés Esquivel - Petroleum Engineer | AI & ML

hero.name: Carlos Andrés Esquivel Plazas
hero.title: Petroleum Engineer | AI & Machine Learning
hero.objective: Petroleum engineer with solid experience in field operations and the use of artificial intelligence for reservoir characterization, seeking opportunities to apply advanced technological solutions in the area of petrophysics.

about.title: Professional Profile
about.description: Petroleum engineer with experience in wireline, well testing and subsurface data analysis, complemented with advanced skills in data science, machine learning and deep learning. I have led innovative projects that apply artificial intelligence, such as deep neural networks and generative models, for the prediction of synthetic curves in well logs, exceeding expectations with precise and efficient analysis. Expert in Python, MATLAB and AI frameworks, I provide technological solutions that optimize operations in the oil and gas industry.

items.institution: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Career
items.details: Advanced ML and AI techniques, Deep Learning, neural networks and clustering algorithms applied to the petroleum industry.
Advanced English usage for effective communication in multicultural and professional environments.

responsibilities: Coordinated workflows in three specialized areas: Hot area, Cold bar and Pizzeria
Optimized dish delivery to more than 400 daily diners during peak hours
Reduced order delivery times from 10-20 minutes to 5-10 minutes
Improved leadership skills managing bilingual teams in high-pressure environment
Developed computer vision model for automatic tool recognition
Reduced report preparation time by 40%
Implemented solution in Python using computer vision frameworks
Optimized workflows and reduced manual processing errors
Prepared and compiled data for strategic business development reports
Designed databases in Excel and SQL, modeled data using MATLAB
Automated data storage and retrieval processes
Optimized document management of physical and electronic files
Performed wireline and well testing operations
Managed pressure and temperature tests (decline/restoration, injection and interference)
Supervised field tests to ensure data integrity and quality
Improved reliability of memory logs ensuring accurate results
Provided operational and analytical support ensuring QHSE compliance
Evaluated operational processes to implement integrated management system
Applied improvements in procedures to optimize execution times
Ensured compliance with quality standards

items.title: Petrophysical Analysis and Synthetic Log Prediction
items.description: Led the development of a predictive model for synthetic curves in well logs, applying machine learning and artificial intelligence. Implemented advanced techniques of SVM, decision trees and deep learning.

items.title: Water Drive Effect in Reservoir Boundary
items.description: Developed software to detect water intrusion in reservoirs with hydraulic activity, improving the accuracy of OOIP calculations and well drainage area.
